translated: Since I went forth,🔽twenty-five years have passed.

analyzed: accharā saṅghāta mattam pi  cetas santi manajjha ga
translated: I have not entered into the peacefulness of mind🔽even for the time it takes to snap the fingers.
Not having attained one-pointedness of mind,
I went out of the dwelling

original: Ko attho jīvitena me;🔽Kathaṁ hi sikkhaṁ paccakkhaṁ,
analyzed: kaḥ atthaḥ jīvitena me  katham hi sikkham paccakkha
translated: what is the point of my life?
How could one like me🔽give up the training and die?
and sat down on the bed.
see the truth of the Dhamma!
The three knowledges have been attained
and the Buddha’s instruction has been fulfilled.”
